detail_desc: Blouse in an airy cotton weave with short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top, and a flounce around the neckline.

Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button, and a small frill trim around the armholes. Detachable, braided belt, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Straight-style shirt in a soft cotton weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
